channel.title: I download peoples servers, but
channel.description: Basically i download peoples servers, and when they are .rar, i can never open them. Someone please tell me what program do i open them with? and when i download a .zip, then i unzip it, and it always comes up as moparscape, not as the server i downloaded. it starts all over, even if it saved. someone please help me, thanks. :eek:[br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2007, 03:37:23 PM[/size][hr]I want to know why when i download a server, it doesnt load, just the regular old moparscape does. Please help?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2007, 03:39:59 PM[/size][hr]--READ THIS--Peoples servers wont load, i get a message saying the current window isnt running the right Java application, and it asks whether or not you want to open another window to open the right java app. and have it run. so i hit yes, and another java icon comes up in my toolbar next to the time, but it loads mopar, not the server i chose :mad:

item.title: I download peoples servers, but
item.dc:creator: @MC_Gower MC Gower
item.description:
@MC_Gower wrote:

http://winrar.com
or
http://rarlabs.com

Read full topic

item.title: I download peoples servers, but
item.dc:creator: @Pilldom Pilldom
item.description:
@Pilldom wrote:

Its cause you need to unzip them. Go to google and get winrar. Then right click and choose extract here once you have winrar.

Read full topic
